howItWorksClient.title: How it works for clients?
howItWorksClient.subtitle: A simple process to find a technician
howItWorksClient.step1_description: Tell us what's broken and upload a photo of the device
howItWorksClient.step2_description: Technicians will offer solutions and a fair price
howItWorksClient.step3_description: Look at experience, equipment and real reviews
howItWorksClient.step4_description: Money is protected by escrow until the work is completed

howItWorksMaster.title: How it works for technicians?
howItWorksMaster.subtitle: A simple process for business development
howItWorksMaster.step1_description: Describe your skills, equipment and specialization
howItWorksMaster.step2_description: Clients find you by specialization and rating
howItWorksMaster.step3_description: Perform repairs and get paid without commissions
howItWorksMaster.step4_description: Build your reputation and get more orders

features.title: Platform advantages
features.subtitle: Everything you need for a safe and profitable repair
features.feature1_description: Communicate directly with the technician, without intermediaries and managers.
features.feature2_description: You see the experience, equipment (microscopes, soldering stations) and real reviews.
features.feature3_description: Escrow payments protect your deal, just like on the best P2P platforms.
features.feature4_description: No markups and hidden fees of service centers.
features.feature5_description: Built-in arbitration system for fair resolution of any issues.
